attributes.action: Get tougher with Job Seekers Allowance for persons without dependents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently there are over 800,000 people claiming Job Seekers Allowance at a cost of around £5 million per week!! 
You only have to look on the Jobcentre website and there are thousands of jobs available which require NO skills or qualifications, but are not considered good enough by JSA claimants. 
Those without dependents would undoubtedly be better off working at minimum wage (£240 per week) than claiming JSA, and so the country would too!
JSA should only be available for 8 weeks for persons without dependents - then they would HAVE to take a job - cleaning or whatever.
